alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kit Carson County through 545 PM MDT... At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Flagler, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flagler around 535 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 391 and 404. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
